scripts.build-native: napi build --platform -p next-swc-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_swc_napi --features plugin,rustls-tls --js false native
scripts.build-native-release: napi build --platform -p next-swc-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_swc_napi --release --features plugin,rustls-tls,tracing/release_max_level_info --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin: napi build --platform -p next-swc-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_swc_napi --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin-woa: napi build --platform -p next-swc-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_swc_napi --cargo-flags=--no-default-features --features native-tls --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin-woa-release: napi build --platform -p next-swc-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name next_swc_napi --release --cargo-flags=--no-default-features --features native-tls,tracing/release_max_level_info --js false native
scripts.rust-check: cd ../../; cargo fmt -- --check && cargo clippy --all -- -D warnings -A deprecated && cargo check -p next-dev --no-default-features --features cli,custom_allocator,rustls-tls,serializable && rm -rf target
scripts.test-cargo-integration: cross-env CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_LTO=false cargo nextest run -p next-dev-tests --release --no-fail-fast
scripts.test-cargo-bench: cross-env CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_LTO=false TURBOPACK_BENCH_COUNTS=10 TURBOPACK_BENCH_CACHED=1 TURBOPACK_BENCH_PROGRESS=1 cargo test --benches -p next-dev --release --no-fail-fast
